text: Edge is a monthly video game magazine in the United Kingdom. It was created by video games journalist Steve Jarratt. It published its first issue in October 1993, saying the face of videos games were changing and spotlighting the 3DO. The cover art for the 100th edition of Edge featured Mario and Luigi. It was drawn by Shigeru Miyamoto of Nintendo. Circulation for the magazine was 25,571 in 2012, 20,485 in 2013, and 18,082 in 2014. In May 2014, the websites of Edge and Computer and Video Games were shut down. ==References== Category:1993 establishments in the United Kingdom Category:British weekly magazines Category:Video game magazines
title: Edge (magazine)
